    • Method Detail

      • checkStatus

        public static boolean checkStatus​(User user,
                                  BTOProject project)
        Check if the user is an applicant and if he/she has already applied for the project.
        Parameters:
        user - the user who wants to submit the application
        project - the project to which the application is submitted
        Returns:
        true if the user can submit the application, false otherwise

      • selectFlatType

        public static void selectFlatType​(User user,
                                  BTOProject project)
        Let the user select the flat type (2-room, 3-room).
        Parameters:
        user - the user who wants to submit the application
        project - the project to which the application is submitted

      • submitApplication

        public static void submitApplication​(User user,
                                     BTOProject project,
                                     FlatType flatType)
        Submit an application to the system for a given user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user who wants to submit the application
        project - the project to which the application is submitted
        flatType - the type of flat being applied for

      • withdrawApplication

        public static void withdrawApplication​(User user,
                                       BTOApplication application)
        Withdraw an application from the system for a given user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user who wants to withdraw the application
        application - the BTOApplication to be withdrawn

        Book a flat for a given user.
        Parameters:

        application - the BTOApplication to be booked

        Withdraw a booked flat for a given user.
        Parameters:

        application - the BTOApplication to be withdrawn
